name: NSUserActivity
desc: A representation of the state of your app at a moment in time.

items.name: activityType
items.desc: The activity type with which the user activity object was created.

items.name: title
items.desc: An optional, user-visible title for this activity, such as a document name or web page title.

items.name: requiredUserInfoKeys
items.desc: A set of keys that represent the minimal information about the activity that should be stored for later restoration.

items.name: userInfo
items.desc: A dictionary containing app-specific state information needed to continue an activity on another device.

items.name: needsSave
items.desc: Indicates that the state of the activity needs to be updated.

items.name: contentAttributeSet
items.desc: A set of properties that describe the activity.

items.name: keywords
items.desc: A set of localized keywords that can help users find the activity in search results.

items.name: persistentIdentifier
items.desc: A value used to identify the user activity.

items.name: isEligibleForHandoff
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the activity can be continued on another device using Handoff.

items.name: isEligibleForSearch
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the activity should be added to the on-device index.

items.name: isEligibleForPublicIndexing
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether the activity can be publicly accessed by all iOS users.

items.name: expirationDate
items.desc: The date after which the activity is no longer eligible for Handoff or indexing.

items.name: becomeCurrent
items.desc: Marks the activity as currently in use by the user.

items.name: resignCurrent
items.desc: Marks this activity object as inactive without invalidating it.

items.name: invalidate
items.desc: Invalidates an activity and marks it as no longer eligible for continuation.

items.name: delegate
items.desc: The user activity object’s delegate.

items.name: supportsContinuationStreams
items.desc: A Boolean value that determines whether the continuing app can request streams to be opened back to the originating app.

items.name: webpageURL
items.desc: Webpage to load in a browser to continue the activity.

items.name: isEligibleForPrediction
items.desc: A Boolean value that determines whether Siri can suggest the user activity as a shortcut to the user.

items.name: suggestedInvocationPhrase
items.desc: A phrase suggested to the user when they create a shortcut.

items.name: interaction
items.desc: The SiriKit interaction object to use when configuring your app.

items.name: ndefMessagePayload
items.desc: The NDEF message read by the system in the background.

items.name: mapItem
items.desc: Attaches the specified map item to a user activity object.

items.name: NSUserActivityTypeBrowsingWeb
items.desc: An activity that continues from Handoff or a universal link.

items.name: NSUserActivityConnectionUnavailableError
items.desc: The user activity couldn’t be continued because a required connection was not available.

items.name: NSUserActivityErrorMaximum
items.desc: The end of the range of error codes reserved for user activity errors.

items.name: NSUserActivityErrorMinimum
items.desc: The start of the range of error codes reserved for user activity errors.

items.name: NSUserActivityHandoffFailedError
items.desc: The data for the user activity was not available.

items.name: NSUserActivityHandoffUserInfoTooLargeError
items.desc: The user info dictionary was too large to receive.

items.name: NSUserActivityRemoteApplicationTimedOutError
items.desc: The remote application failed to send data within the specified time.

items.name: contextIdentifierPath
items.desc: The identifier path associated with a user activity generated by an app that adopts ClassKit.

items.name: isClassKitDeepLink
items.desc: Indicates whether a user activity represents a ClassKit context.
